import React from 'react' import BabyHeading from '../Heading' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { getProductsByCategory } from '../../../app/data/productsData' const Category = () => { const categories = getMainCategories() return ( <>
{categories.map((category, index) => (
{category.name}

{category.itemCount} Ürün

) } export default Category
